attributes.action: England should become an independent sovereign state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the dictatorship of the EU & now the British MP expenses this time in our English history the only thing that would save our country is to become independent with its own government,parliament & English Prime Minister. England's economy would be much stronger if it stood alone & started relations with the worlds upcoming economies.
Immigration would only be available into England on a control work permit basis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
